doc:
Marvin Felix Camillo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marvin_Felix_Camillo 0 Marvin Felix Camillo (born 1937, Newark, New Jersey – January 22, 1988, La Rochelle, France) is an American theatre director and actor, noted for his founding of The Family theatre company, a group in New York largely made up of ex-convicts. Marvin_Felix_Camillo ( born 1937 , Newark , New_Jersey – January_22_,_1988 , La_Rochelle , France ) is an_American_theatre_director_and_actor , noted for his_founding of The_Family_theatre_company , a_group in New_York largely made up of ex-convicts .
